page.title: 14Haworth First School
page.content: {Haworth First School}is{89}years old. We have{243}pupils-{119}girls and{124 boys.The children are aged from{3}to{9 and divided into 7 classes(1 reception ;3 aged 5 to 7;3 aged 7 to 9).We have {8 teachers}and a{head-mistress.}The nursery children are cared for by{1 {teacher}and{2 nurses.}Our nursery was originally a wartime nursery building. Our R.E.lessons are{multi-culture although we are all-white except for one Chinese boy.As well as lessons we have clubs for many activities. The hall is in the centre,surrounded by classrooms including an artroom, a TV room,a playroom and a library area. Meals are provided in our own kitchen in the nearby{community centre (previously the junior school until the 1960's).Our{cook}and her{4 helpers prepare approx. 100 meals each day. { "We are one big,very happy family!"
